ygData.subject: Sitting made productive.
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know if you all do something like this already or not, but I ll give it a shot.  What I, in my callow youth, have discovered, is that when I am without
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know if you all do something like this already or not, but I'll give
it a shot. What I, in my callow youth, have discovered, is that when I am
without a healer and I take a fletching kit and arrow components along to
make arrows while I sit to heal, I don't mind the waiting as much. You may
be wealthy enough to afford arrows from the store, but I prefer the lovingly
handcrafted and economical arrows of my own making. Just thought you might
be interested in my solitary original tidbit.

Rocjaw,
Son of Halas
